name: Techno Towers - For GDevelop Jam #1
description:
Build as many towers as you can before you run out of time, but make sure they don't collapse.

How To Play:

LMB / Space:  Drop a Block.

Mouse-wheel / A & D/ Left & Right: Rotate a block.

---

Reach the target height and hold there to score.

Blocks Reset After Scoring.

The Game Ends When The Timer Runs Out.

If Blocks Fall Off-screen you lose time.

Scoring adds bonus time.

SPACE TO START

Made with GDevelop Completely Solo in 3 Days for The 1st GDevelop Gamejam.

All Art, Code, SFX & Music was created by Fatal Exit.
